alert.note: Alert for Laurel; McCreary; Pulaski; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 8:30PM EDT until May 18 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wayne County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... Northeastern McCreary County in south central Kentucky... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 830 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Faubush, or 12 miles west of Somerset, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pointer around 835 PM EDT. Nancy around 840 PM EDT. Somerset Pulaski Airport around 850 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Somerset, Mount Victory and Huxley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
